column5: So hyped for my boys!!!!  On saturday they are going for lunch with the stanley cup!!!! Oh and my old chum Duncan Keith too!!!!  They are presenting him with an unreal pair of moccassins made by grandma!  Cant wait to see the look in my kids eyes and hang out with the cup baby!!!!
Thats awesome! Take lots of pictures..Oh and have a blast!
Going to be a great time, enjoy

wheeeew....I thought at first when i read the post title I was thinking you were a leaf fan getting too ramped up for the season,thinking the cup was comin...LMAO.....anyways enjoy the day with the cup
Hahahah I origianlly had "not toronto" added into the title ???  Gonna be a blast!
Heartbreaking...  Went in to ER today and I am out with a staph infection on my foot?  Dont think Ill make it tomorrow but at least the kiddos will?

Just a few pics off the blackhawks website.  I wasnt able to go but my boys did go with grandma and had a blast!!!!  She got pics of their dinner together so I gotta wait for her to get them developed, all other pics should be emailed to me within a few days.  Pretty awesome of him! He hit the hospital, all the local arenas, crashed a wedding with the cup at the rendezvous lol.  Stand up guy?
